thread.title: Cortech Engineering Named on Inc. Magazine's Top 5,000 List
thread.title_full: Cortech Engineering Named on Inc. Magazine's Top 5,000 List

author: Kristin Beshore
title: Cortech Engineering Named on Inc. Magazine's Top 5,000 List
text:
Cortech Engineering, California and Nevada’s premier distributor for pumps and process equipment, has been named in Inc. Magazine as one of the top 5,000 fastest growing companies in America. Cortech made the list in 2014, as well, and they are proud to announce they are in an even higher position for 2015. Each year Inc. Magazine compiles a list of the fastest growing companies in America and each spot is an honor to hold that is coveted by companies across the U.S. Cortech is proud to be on the list again this year among other great companies like Fitbit, Microsoft, Smashburger, and GoPro.
Cortech is proud of the team who is responsible for making them the company that they are today. They have worked hard to continue to expand their product offering, offer superior customer service, and become a leading innovator in the pump industry. Remaining in the ranks of the 5,000 honored companies is a feat that has been accomplished with hard work, dedication, and loyalty from employees and customers alike. Cortech looks forward to another year of success and growth fueled by encouragement from this humbling and appreciated award.
For more information about news and events from Cortech Engineering, connect with us on Facebook (Facebook.com/CortechEngineering), Twitter (@CortechPumps), and at http://www.cortecheng.com .
To view Cortech’s blog, go to cortecheng.com/blog.
About Cortech Engineering:
Cortech Engineering opened their doors in 1987 and has since become one of the leading distributors for pumps and process equipment in Central California, Southern California, and Southern Nevada. They provide quality products, vast industrial knowledge, and unmatched customer support.
